Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory699.jpg'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStorySnowNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: 'DialogEnable'}
{3: 'Sensing a faint tremble beneath your feet, you see the snowstorm before you. You are walking on clouds.'}
{3: 'Where am I? That is the first question in your mind.'}
{3: 'Unlike the ice field of ARU, there is brown soil and green sprouts here. This is not the North Pole.'}
{3: 'White mountain range casts a shadow in the valley. It looks like a wall built at the end of the world or the entrance to the dreamland.'}
{3: 'Why are you here? You are bewildered by the unknown landscape.'}
{3: 'Searching aimlessly, you see nothing but infinite white.'}
{3: 'Perhaps you should head further down?'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryFallNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory698.jpg', 3: '0', 4: '1', 5: '1'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryFallNew.prefab'}
{3: 'Right then, you step onto nothing. The sense of weightlessness overwhelms you, and your field of view drops.'}
{3: 'You finally understand what you are seeing.'}
{3: 'In the back, where the sun does not shine, are black cliffs standing above a field of snow.'}
{3: 'They look like intersecting castles, watchtowers, or monsters hidden in the shadows.'}
{3: 'Looking further ahead, there is a dark fort in the distance where the mountains are exposed.'}
{3: 'That is where you need to go. You are certain of it.'}
{3: 'You start heading toward it, but right before you take your first step, you raise a third question.'}
{3: 'Who am I<//YOU>?'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiHuaping.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStorySnowNew.prefab'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png'}
{3: 'The question is like a slap in the face, pulling you out of the chaos.'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiHuaping.prefab'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory604.jpg'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryZhengyanNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{3: 'You sit up abruptly, and the wet object on your forehead slides down.'}
{3: 'The person beside you is seemingly startled and lets out a muted scream.'}
{3: 'Looking at the wet towel on you and recalling the voice you heard, you start to find your bearings.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: 'How are you feeling, Commandant?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Sitting beside you, she hands you a glass of water. Only then do you realize you are feeling quite thirsty.'}
{2: '(Take the water)', 3: '51'}
{3: 'As the water goes down your throat, you begin to remember what happened last night.'}
{3: 'After you took care of Lucia and sent your report to the General Staff through the encrypted channel, you took a painkiller and fell asleep.'}
{3: 'Your roughly wrapped wound has now been professionally dressed. Seeing the open medical kit nearby, you are quite certain what has occurred.'}
{2: 'Just a stomach ache.', 3: '56'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'That would be the side effects of the painkiller. You should take less in the future, Commandant.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'It was a special occasion.', 3: '58'}
{3: 'Liv refills your empty glass with warm water. As the warmth enters your body, the pain also diminishes.'}
{2: 'Did the commander send you?', 3: '60'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "Lee is also here. He's guiding the medical transport craft to our location.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Medical transport craft?', 3: '62'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "Yeah. I heard they're planning to perform a remote operation on it.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'What happened, Commandant?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Liv closes and clutches her hands, resting them uneasily upon her knees and looking worried.'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'What happened to Lucia? When I cleaned your wounds, I found out that...', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Liv bites her lips, seemingly unable to believe what she has verified over and over again.'}
{2: 'What did Commander Nikola tell you?', 3: '69'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'Our mission just said Lucia was unable to operate at the moment, so Lee and I were sent to support you after our inspections.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'Strangely, Celica implored us to trust your judgment once we arrived on the surface.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'That is an oddly unnecessary reminder. Gray Raven is not a squad of rookies that lacks teamwork, and Lee and Liv are not troublemakers.'}
{3: 'Those words seem to be meant for you instead of them.'}
{2: 'My judgment, is it...?', 3: '74'}
{2: "When Lee is done, I'll...", 3: '75'}
{3: 'Before you can finish, an alarm goes off in the temporary camp.'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'Incoming Corrupted... How can there be this many of them?!', 4: '1'}
{2: "We can't let them impact the transport craft.", 3: '84'}
{3: 'Your terminal also marks out where most of the Corrupted are attacking from.'}
{2: 'Liv, head to this fighting position...', 3: '86'}
{2: "I'll handle this end...", 3: '87'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 3: '1'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Lee pinpoints the location you were going to send him right as your comms connects.'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "I'm heading there, right?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'I can always count on you, Lee...', 3: '94'}
{3: 'Lee smiles noncommittally before donning his usual serious expression.'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "My composite armaments can hit enemies from an extremely long distance, so don't hesitate to ask for my help.", 4: '1'}
{2: "Don't complain about me exploiting you afterward.", 3: '99'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "I'll go to my position.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Liv wants to dissuade you at first, but she decides to leave you a reminder in the end.'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "Stay safe. Don't overexert yourself.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'I will. My comms will be open.', 3: '108'}
{2: "Let's go."}
